page.title: 09AGRICULTURE
page.content:
There are several reasons for the increased yield of farm crops:- 1. Plant breeders have developed {better plants. 2. The new plants are{more resistant to disease. 3. More and better{machinery}has been developed to do the work. 4.{Artificial fertilizers}will produce more growth. 5.{Chemical sprays}kill insects, prevent disease, regulate stalk growth and kill weeds.
In addition to the main crops of wheat and barley there are a few fields of other crops. Oil-seed rape, which is bright yellow at the end of May. Beans and oats are grown for animal feed and a clover mixture for hay. Some farmers grow a field of canary grass to attract pheasants.
